item.description:
In preparation for my upcoming workshop, I decided to give a more intimate talk, which will include a Q&A session, on the following topic:

"Answers to two most important dating questions, 'Where do I go?' and 'What do I say?' "

 

It was not even 10 years ago that I was looking for the answers to the same two questions. Nothing seemed more important...

Little did I know that I was just not ready to hear the answer. I simply did not know, nor was there anyone to teach me, that there was something very vital to discover before asking those two oh-so important questions.

But, today, after having created quite a few amazing relationships, and having taught others to do the same, I'm ready to share my secrets.

 

I will explain to you why things may not have worked for you so far; what you absolutely must do before asking the two most important dating questions, and, how to proceed further, so you can find yourself with that one person who will absolutely blow your socks off.

 

As a very special bonus, I will include two presentations:

1) "What women want" & "What men want"

and

2) "How to understand the mind of opposite sex"
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the second floor, or, just gimme a shout 617.600.8579
item.name: Answers to two most important dating questions
